name: Toon Hoop Basket: Tap Tap Basketball, Hot Shoot
name_original: Toon Hoop Basket: Tap Tap Basketball, Hot Shoot
description:
Toon Hoop Basket is an awesome toon basketball game that anybody can enjoy! It's very simple, all you have to do is tapping the screen to make the ball bounce a bit. When the ball is in the hoop you get the points and the hoop moves to another side of toon basketball court. This tap tap basketball arcade requires immense precision and reaction. Can you become the best in this mini basketball arcade?

While the gameplay is easy, there is time limit that will require your calmness and fast precision. The timer will not stop until you score again, so be sure to not miss your shots. There is another tricky part in this toon basketball arcade – the time of the countdown gets shorter and shorter each time you score. This makes players tapping and tapping the screen trying to dunk before the final buzz. That’s why we can say that Toon Hoop Basket is an awesome, yet ultra-exciting and fun tap basketball hoop shooting game!

Did we mentioned that we have amazing basketball courts and ball skins in our toon basketball tap shooting game?

Well, explore and enjoy – we are sure it’ll be one of the most interesting tap basketball games you’ve ever played.
